statements: SELECT * FROM HospitalBilling;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM HospitalBilling;
SELECT billing_amount, billing_date FROM HospitalBilling;
SELECT * FROM HospitalBilling ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM HospitalBilling WHERE billing_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HospitalBilling WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM HospitalBilling WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM HospitalBilling WHERE billing_amount < 500 OR billing_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM HospitalBilling WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%' AND billing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, MAX(billing_amount) AS max_billing FROM HospitalBilling GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_billing > 5000;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transactions WHERE amount = 50.00;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT transactions.patient_id, patients.name, transactions.amount FROM transactions JOIN patients ON transactions.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Billing ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, billing_amount FROM Billing WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT admin_name FROM Administrators WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT admin_id, department FROM Administrators ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM Billing WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT billing_amount, billing_date, patient_id FROM Billing ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(billing_amount), MAX(billing_amount), MIN(billing_amount) FROM Billing;
SELECT * FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE amount >= 1000 AND description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT admin_name, hire_date, department FROM Administrators ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT admin_name, admin_department FROM hospital_administration;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM patient_records ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT admin_name, admin_department, admin_email FROM hospital_administration JOIN billing_info ON hospital_administration.admin_id = billing_info.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'expense';
SELECT * FROM hospital_administration;
SELECT admin_name, admin_department FROM hospital_administration ORDER BY admin_department DESC;
SELECT admin_name, admin_email FROM hospital_administration WHERE admin_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age > 40 AND patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, admission_date FROM patient_records WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE amount_due > 1000;
SELECT admin_id, admin_name, admin_role FROM Administrators;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT invoice_id, amount_due FROM Invoices WHERE paid_status = TRUE;
SELECT admin_name, admin_email FROM Administrators WHERE admin_role = 'Manager';
